fields.description:
Tags were known to be working properly on or around april 25th but since then the following symptoms are seen:

- euca-describe-instances does not show euca:node tag
- euca-describe-nodes does not show instances on nodes
- euca-describe-tags output is empty

comments.body:
See a lot of these exceptions in the logs about account 00000000 not being found when issuing the commands:

{code}
2013-05-01 10:55:31 ERROR 000000204 Topology                 | START:DISABLED  arn:euca:eucalyptus::loadbalancing:10.111.1.63/ NOTREADY->DISABLED=NOTREADY [LoadBalancingPropertyBootstrapper.enable( ): returned false, terminating bootstrap for component: loadbalancing]
2013-05-01 10:55:31 DEBUG 000000234 adBalancerASGroupCreator | Load balancer EMI property is unset.  "
                          |               + "Use euca-modify-property -p loadbalancing.loadbalancer_emi=<load balancer emi> "

I'm seeing this issue on a setup from scratch using account eucalyptus and user admin.
I see there's a link to EUCA-5625.  That's very suspicious.  I'd guess that's the culprit.
